author: grapebaba
content: Since we are working on zig-libp2p for ethereum, a quick question about multiplex. From this artical https://blog.libp2p.io/libp2p-and-ethereum/#how-ethereum-beacon-nodes-use-libp2p-%F0%9F%94%8D yamux is optional. However is it up to date? Have all clients transited to yamux already? We wanna only to implement yamux.

author: pawandhananjay
content: not all clients have yamux support. See https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3866

author: cortze
content: there is a big push towards deprecating mplex anyways, maybe it is time to migrate all the teams to yamux until QUIC is adopted?

author: grapebaba
content: https://github.com/OffchainLabs/prysm/pull/13786 it seems the PR need be updated
